author: Techlore
description:
Discover how websites can identify and track you—even without cookies—using browser fingerprinting. This masterclass breaks down how your browser reveals a unique digital "fingerprint" that follows you across the web, with real demonstrations comparing protection levels in different browsers. Learn practical strategies for every experience level, from simple tweaks to advanced techniques, and understand which privacy tools actually work. Whether you're new to privacy or a seasoned defender, this guide will help you minimize your digital footprint while maintaining a usable browsing experience.

Thank you to our sponsor Notesnook! They offer E2EE notes in an open source ecosystem, free to try. Visit their site to get started: https://notesnook.com

Some Sources:

https://coveryourtracks.eff.org/

https://petsymposium.org/popets/2024/popets-2024-0092.pdf
https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/23/6/3087
https://
title: Browser Fingerprinting Masterclass: How It Works & How To Protect Yourself
